thread.title: 164 students receive degrees at NUTECH convocation
thread.title_full: 164 students receive degrees at NUTECH convocation

author: @Our Correspondent
title: 164 students receive degrees at NUTECH convocation
text:
Islamabad: National University of Technology (NUTECH) held its 3rd convocation ceremony, at the University Campus Islamabad. The event was graced by the Federal Minister for Science and Technology Dr. Khalid Maqbool Siddiqui, as the chief guest, Chairman HEC Dr. Mukhtar Ahmed, HI and other distinguished guests including parents of graduating students.
The convocation ceremony marked a significant milestone in the academic journey of NUTECH's graduates, as they received their well-deserved degrees and embarked on the next phase of their professional careers. A total of 164 students from the diverse fields of Engineering, IT and Technology received their degrees. High achievers of these degrees program were awarded with Gold and Silver Medals. The event served as a platform to acknowledge their hard work, dedication, and achievements throughout their academic pursuits at NUTECH.
Federal Minister for Science and Technology Dr. Khalid Maqbool Siddiqui, delivered the keynote address as the Chief Guest. With his vast experience and strong leadership in shaping the educational landscape of Pakistan, his insights inspired the graduating students towards a successful future.
